title: what is this font?
content:
hi! i’m trying to distinguish this font taken from a russ meyer movie poster. i’d really appreciate it as i’m trying to put together a type & illustration poster on him and would like to take the retro feel from this type.

thanks so much!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071109073929im_/http:/typophile.com/files/item_305_1_6241.jpg)

 [‹ Animated GIF user icons](http://web.archive.org/web/20071109073929/http:/typophile.com/node/33245 "Go to previous forum topic") [TheSans Office - Help me find a place to buy it! ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071109073929/http:/typophile.com/node/33238 "Go to next forum topic")
author: camerondaft

comments.content:
i thought it was CandiceEF...  
but it’s not.
this is a swash version of Cooper Black
ahhh, i was looking at cooper black and then just kept going. it’s late here. thanks alot!
